ygData.subject: Re: Paw Corpse Retrieval was Executioners Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: Wouldnt surprise me if monsters have faction standings amongst eachother. Sounds logical But the weirdest fight I ever saw. faction or not, and they wernt
ygData.messageBody:
Wouldnt surprise me if monsters have faction standings amongst eachother.
Sounds logical
But the weirdest fight I ever saw. faction or not, and they wernt charmed.
Was a fight between the 2 priest brothers near the zone border in karanas.
on of them has a realy nice necklace too that gives CHA +10 I belive, I know
I got a faction hit from it but I dested that character after and I dont
know how bad it was. Does anyone know? the funny thing is that the necklace
is a LORE item so I guess it is part of some quest too

Anyone got any leads on this?

Vashi, Eternal warriors

>From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>
>Well I have seen other monsters fighting monsters but only when
>someone has charmed them (probably what happened with the
>grizzly fighting the hill giant, and the lions attack anything that
>is bi-pedal :) ). This was beyond unpredictable. Ghanex just
>stands there and summons his pets. I never seen a pet turn
>on its owner before.
>
> > ----------
> > From: Jynxx[SMTP:Jynxx@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 1:19 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Paw Corpse Retrieval was Executioners Axe
> >
> > From: "Jynxx" <Jynxx@...>
> >
> > In regards to Ghanex's zombies attacking him....
> >
> > You have to remember the AI that they have on these things. Who knows?
> > They
> > could have broken the spell that entraped them, or they could just have
> > gotten pissed off at him. I see monsters fighting monsters all the time.
>A
> > griz was fighting a hill giant the other day in W. Karana, and in the
>same
> > day I saw a lion take out one of the two farmers. All I'm saying is,
>they
> > made the monsters AI very unpredictable, and that is the result.
> >
> > Tyveris,
> > Aspiring Samurai
